index.description: Nabla: GPU-accelerated Python library for array computation with NumPy-like API and JAX-style transformations. Fast, composable, and Mojo-integrated.

api/index.description: Complete API reference for Nabla - Python library for GPU-accelerated array operations, transformations, and neural networks.

tutorials/index.description: Learn Nabla with hands-on tutorials covering GPU computing, automatic differentiation, and machine learning examples.

api/array.description: Array class documentation - the fundamental array type in Nabla for GPU-accelerated computation.

api/transforms.description: Function transformations in Nabla: vmap, grad, jit, and other automatic differentiation tools.

tutorials/understanding_nabla_part1.description: Introduction to Nabla fundamentals: arrays, operations, and GPU acceleration basics.

tutorials/jax_vs_nabla_mlp_cpu.description: Performance comparison between JAX and Nabla for MLP training on CPU with code examples.

tutorials/jax_vs_nabla_transformer_cpu.description: JAX vs Nabla transformer training comparison - performance benchmarks and implementation details.
